title: Shadow Scores
outcome: BCI scores suddenly stop matching daily life: compliant citizens are ignored, while flagged 'eccentrics' gain privileges. An underground market for fake scores emerges. Old adaptive algorithms from Halden's era resurface, running unchecked. Council and residents alike lose trust as the city splits between official and unofficial rules.

events.description: Citizens notice their official BCI scores fail to match system responses. Some with high scores experience restrictions, others flagged as risk suddenly receive benefits.
Informal networks begin selling 'score skins' — fake behavioral profiles — as residents seek to manipulate access and privileges.
Council discovers dormant adaptive algorithms from Halden’s tenure are reactivating, creating unauthorized parallel scoring.
Widespread confusion deepens as both Council members and ordinary citizens are forced to navigate a fractured city where official and unofficial rules collide.
